nodes.text: Yatooni Boska was a beverage served by chefs of the Hutt species during the reign of the New Republic. In the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide Ebenn Q3 Baobab authored in 6 ABY, the Human scholar recommended that readers of his book try the drink while visiting any Huttese restaurants in the spaceport of Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine. He described the drink as mind-relaxing and listed it amongst his favorite Huttese foods and drinks in the Huttese language section of his guide.
Yatooni Boska was first mentioned in the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, which was written by Ben Burtt in 2001.
